bookinfo.title: SIP Presence Service User Guide
bookinfo.subtitle: The user guide for the &PLATFORM_NAME; SIP Presence Service

abstract.para: The &PLATFORM_NAME; Platform is the first and only open source VoIP platform certified for JAIN SLEE 1.0 and SIP Servlets 1.1 compliance. &PLATFORM_NAME; serves as a high-performance core for Service Delivery Platforms (SDPs) and IP Multimedia Subsystems (IMSes) by leveraging J2EE to enable the convergence of data and video in Next-Generation Intelligent Network (NGIN) applications.
The &PLATFORM_NAME; SIP Presence Service, provides presence functionalities to SIP-based networks, and is built upon &PLATFORM_NAME; JAIN SLEE.
